1712959006.3936455.sceneDescription: In this video segment, a person is unwrapping a package of bread, taking out two slices, and placing them on a wooden surface. They appear to be preparing to make a sandwich or some other meal with the bread.

1712959019.197676.sceneDescription: Someone is spreading a substance like margarine or butter on two slices of bread. The product being used is Nuttelex Original, a dairy-free spread.

1712959030.3001494.sceneDescription: In this segment of a video, slices of bread are being spread with butter. The action progresses with the spreading of butter starting on one slice and then moving to the other, with a focus on evenly covering each slice.

1712959046.9442198.sceneDescription: In this segment of the video, someone is spreading a creamy, white substance, likely butter or a spread, on two slices of multigrain bread. The spread is being applied evenly across the surfaces of the bread slices.

1712959058.6249409.sceneDescription: In this segment, a person is preparing to spread jam on slices of bread, first by setting a jar of homemade mixed berry jam on the board next to the bread, then unscrewing the lid. They remove the lid and set it aside to use the jam.

1712959070.998235.sceneDescription: In this segment of the video, someone is preparing a sandwich by spreading butter on two slices of bread and then adding jam to one of them. They use a knife to spread the jam over the buttered surface of the bread.

1712959081.576894.sceneDescription: In this video segment, someone is spreading jam on a slice of bread that has already been coated with butter or a similar spread. Over the span of these frames, the person evenly distributes the jam across the surface of the bread.

1712959094.381667.sceneDescription: In this segment of the video, a person is spreading what appears to be strawberry jam on a slice of bread with a knife. The bread is resting on a wooden cutting board, and the individual is using their other hand to keep the bread stable while applying the jam.

1712959107.2326646.sceneDescription: In this segment of the video, someone is making a peanut butter and jelly sandwich by spreading peanut butter on one slice of bread and jelly on another, and then pressing the two slices together. The final frame shows the completed sandwich resting on the wooden surface.

1712959119.9601893.sceneDescription: In this segment of the video, a person is halving a slice of bread several times while rotating each half and stacking them together before finally covering the stacked pieces with a plate. The result is a neatly stacked pile of bread triangles.

1712959131.3518693.sceneDescription: A person is cutting a sandwich into smaller pieces and then assembling them on a plate. The sandwich pieces are arranged in a way that every second piece hides the cut, making it appear as a whole sandwich on the plate.

1712959140.5186908.sceneDescription: In this segment of the video, a person is arranging and rearranging a sandwich on a plate. Initially, the sandwich appears to be cut into two triangles, and then the person switches one half with another half of a different sandwich, creating a mixed sandwich arrangement.
